import React, { useState} from 'react'; import styled from 'styled-components' // Importing Styled components import './AdminDashboard.css'; import lightModeLogo from './logo-light.png'; import darkModeLogo from './logo-dark.png'; import img1 from './1.jpg' import img2 from './2.png' import img3 from './3.png' function AdminDashboard () { const [myIcon, setMyIcon] = useState('material-icons-sharp') const [theme, setTheme] = useState('lightmode') const [isLightActive, setIsLightActive] = useState(true) const [isDarkActive, setIsDarkActive] = useState(false) const [cls, setCls] = useState(); // class of aside in media Query (for mobile) whether the menu is displayed or closed const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(1); // The side bar actove handle const handleClick = (index) => { setActiveIndex(index); }; return(
